pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools to Query the 'Censys' API // The 'Censys' public search engine enables researchers to quickly ask questions about the hosts and networks that compose the Internet. Details on how 'Censys' was designed and how it is operated are available at https://www.censys.io/about. Both basic and extended research access queries are made available. More information on the SQL dialect used by the 'Censys' engine can be found at https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/reference/legacy-sql.
